Organizing Apathy

I won't vote for Candidate A if you won't vote for Candidate B.
Save yourself a trip to the polls.

Find Out More

Match with an opponent's supporter!

Offset your vote today! Why head to a polling location when you can simply find an opposing voter to counter-act? Both would-be voters save precious time by willingly disenfranchising.

Coming in time for Election Day 2016!
